question:
Some people think that children should be taught to competitive in school. Others however, think cooperation and team working skills are more important.
Discuss both views/sides/points.
text: Some people believe that the institution should focus to make a  kid  competitive, while some others believe academy should focus to develop cooperative and working experience. This essay will discuss on both views.

To commence with, kid are like a plant if we care them, they will be fruitful but if they  don't get proper guidance  they will become futile. So, the university should teach them to be friendly and cooperative. If they are developed prowess, they can easily adjust in every time of environment and kill their self centred and selfishness habit. For instance, a recent study concluded that 90 % scholar can adjust with every type of people only if they have friendly habit and calmness. Furthermore, if  the tutor makes them indulged to trial with peer, then they  can easily develop their company working intelligence which is obligatory for their future soul in every sector.  For example, if the junior has to job in a related field as a doctor, engineer, nurses and so on, they need club performance to get success in their target. Therefore, educator should give prominence on moulding the students more friendly and ameliorating the organization working proficiency.

However, some people believe pupils should be competitive to grab the thrive in their life so academy should focus on this things. If they are competitive in nature, they will never like to lose anything in their soul so they task hard to achieve it. To exemplify, a survey conducted in 2012 concluded that 50% famous people like football player, celebrities and so on have got the fruitful success in an activity  because they are more focus on their achievements and they don't want to lose anything they want. Moreover, competitive type of behaviour always motivates them to be by themselves so they don't care others and just do their tasks. In addition, it will make scholar more strong to struggle with any sort of struggle which might appear in their way. That's why, many people think tutor should bestow priority bro enhance the competitive behaviour among the kids.

To sum up, on one hand competitive aids offsprings to become to get success with the target goal by making them strong mentally, while on the other hand the company working skill and cooperation succour kids to work in an organization very successfully to grab the thrive.
